author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Life Storage Reports Q1 Adjusted FFO Per Share $1.30
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Life Storage Inc:
* LIFE STORAGE, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; RAISES SAME STORE OUTLOOK FOR 2018
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE ABOUT $5.36 TO $5.43 * IN QUARTER INCREASED SAME STORE REVENUE BY 2.5% AND SAME STORE NET OPERATING INCOME BY 2.5%
* Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.28 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $5.35 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2Q NET OPERATING INCOME 2.00 - 3.00%
* SEES FY 2018 NET OPERATING INCOME 1.25 - 2.25%
* SEES 2Q 2018 REVENUE GROWTH 2.25 - 3.25%
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE GROWTH 1.75 - 2.75% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
